{}.response: To search for a contact by name using the 'Search Contacts' API, please provide the 'name' parameter in your API request. The parameter should match the full name or a portion of the name of the contact you are trying to find. Without this parameter, the API cannot perform a search operation. Make sure to include the 'name' parameter like so: {'name': 'John Doe'} in your next request for accurate results.
